name: Curse of Knathdigeth
description:
Dieselpunk sidescroller with a painted aesthetic.

Game is on indefinite hiatus due to intense workload that comes with painting entities.

Controls:

Z - Grenade

X - Jump (press while in air to doublejump)

C - Shoot

← - Run Left

→ - Run Right

↓ - Crouch

↓ + X - Slide
